Title: How to Master the Most Overlooked Leadership Skill with Brendan Wovchko
Description:
Join us as our host, George Kamel, talks to Brendan Wovchko—the chief technology officer here at Ramsey Solutions. He highlights the least understood and least modeled leadership skill out there: accountability. He also shares how to create accountability that lasts and set expectations that stick with your team. Later, Brendan walks through what a conversation should sound like with a team member you need to repair accountability with. This is an episode you’ll want to take notes on, so grab a pen and some paper and get ready to learn how to master accountability.

 

You’ll learn:

•      The one skill most leaders are never taught

•      Why you’re a lazy leader if you avoid this

•      How to create clear expectations with your team

•      How to set your team up for success with one conversation
